short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect if an audio was generated by an AI voice or real voice

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Voice Detector is a browser extension designed to help you identify whether the voice in an audio is real or generated by AI. With the rise of AI voice technologies, this tool empowers users to distinguish between authentic and AI-generated voices in real-time.

Key Features:

Real-Time Analysis: Detect voices directly while listening to audio on platforms like YouTube, Twitter (X), Instagram, and more.
Accurate Detection: Utilizes state-of-the-art AI detection algorithms to ensure high accuracy in results.
User-Friendly Interface: A single click on the extension icon starts the detection process for the currently playing audio.
Supports Multiple Platforms: Works seamlessly with popular streaming and social media sites.
Secure and Private: Processes audio data securely through remote APIs, ensuring privacy and compliance with industry standards.
How It Works:

Install the extension and pin it to your browser toolbar.
While listening to audio on supported websites, click on the AI Voice Detector icon.
The extension captures and processes the audio to determine if the voice is real or AI-generated.
Results are displayed instantly, providing insights into the authenticity of the voice.
Why Use AI Voice Detector 3?

Stay Informed: Protect yourself from potential scams or misinformation involving AI-generated voices.
Peace of Mind: Verify the authenticity of voice content with a simple click.
Cutting-Edge Technology: Leverage the power of advanced AI detection for your everyday browsing.
